post.body: can someone please explain to me what "fail" is all about. i'm feeling OLD!
we haven't promoted the fb fanclub on the sl site YET. the comp is on facebook - advertising on pages 2 get ppl 2 know aboutSL
thank you! good to know TWO of us care about a positive 09! :)
really? what happened when you tried to log in?
did you wear rocketurtle? did you see the latest springleap.com newsletter - linked to your website in it :)
umm. tx 4 the springleap mention BUT the link takes you to an error page on your site rather than http://www.springleap.com
it totally depends on the business model. we use our store to showcase new tshirt designs, and to move last lines of stock.
our facebook promotion is working beyond our expectations so happy even though the cost is heavy
reminds me of a song from my days at holiday camp about doors and windows
GRRRRRRRR http://tinyurl.com/9guf4m (sorry, couldn't resist :))
Thanks Kevin, Cameron, Nick! now totally on track on what fail means. my bad! lekker oaks! shot 4 that! wazzzzzzzzzzzzup
Thanks to the TWO people that have now written positive messages for 09 http://tinyurl.com/ayrz53
here's the link for the positivity post i did http://tinyurl.com/ayrz53 REALLY APPRECIATE IT (need 2b rgstrd)
I need a BIG favour - I set up a blog post asking people to give a positive msg for 09 and i'm the only one so far. Please can u post QUICK
love how you send out a newsletter, count to 10, and the live stats show the number of people on the site SHOOTING upwards
just sent out a newsletter and mentioned the springleap team. shocked as didn't realise there are now SIXTEEN people at springleap!! WOW!!
Just visited the springleap shop in sea point - never seen it so busy. Wondering if we were in a mall like canal walk what it would be like
I really feel like I'll be able to catch up work over the next 10 days. Incoming email has slowed to a standstill - I'm delighted
whose seen the new springleap competition running on facebook? think it's a first. it's getting a LOT OF ATTENTION. but costing a lot too!!
The springleap.com shop at 11 Regent Road in Sea Point went CRAZY today. there are going to be a lot of happy ppl when presents are opened
